memories.caption: Memory #1 Celebrating with family is the best. Also Tiny Suri is so cute
Memory #2 RN beating you in running race was amazing (dw I belive you let him win)
Memory #3 You are my cutest penguin
Memory #4 I have never been more proud of you than when you made chair.
Memory #5 Not you trying to be a UFC fighter against tanmayu
Memory #6 How are you the most serious person I know and yet this goofy.
Memory #7 Wear more Suits and Be better Call Saul
Memory #8 Nerdo
Memory #9

Memory #10 Again I m so proud of you for this. You made your name in front of the people ELA idealizes. You might not like ELA anymore but I m proud you reached that peak. And I know you will climb many more
Memory #11 Yours and Jadi's friendship has always been so cute. Even though its bittersweet sometimes but its still really cute.
Memory #12 Not all Three of us wearing Black
Memory #13  Poor Steven!
Memory #14 I hit my husband
Memory #15 I know this day was a disaster but weirdly I fell in love with you more after that day. ‚ù§Ô∏è
Memory #16 Ok I want to know what happened to this cutie after growing up like where's all that chubbiness???!!
Memory #17 You with your second father. I love RN's influence on you. Better not disappoint him üò§üò§
Memory #18 In world full of followers, you became their king! üëë
Memory #19 I wish that this smile always stays on your face. And I will always try my best to bring it back everytime it goes dim. ‚ù§Ô∏è
